report.title: Great for Relaxation
report.author: Lesserthanyou
report.bodytext: I recently obtained four 25mg librium capsules from a friend. Here's my experience. /n /n t00:00- Three 25mg capsules ingested /n /n t00:15-Feeling of relaxation, chalked off to placebo. /n /n t00:30-More relaxation, my bed feels amazing. Finding it very hard to walk. Not a care in the world. I wanna see how far I can take this so I took a fourth pill equaling 100 mg. /n /n t00:45-Really no effect from the 4th pill. Starting to come down. /n /n t1:00-Normality restored. /n /n Overall this is a great drug for relaxing.
